author: A_Brickset_user
title: A Great Set...Too Sweet to be True...but it is!
review: A great job to LEGO on this set.  I love that it includes some old Fright Knights pieces, like one of the Batlord's men and a lot of bat shields.  It even includes a bat!  I love the way the gears inside make the train bounce up and down.  I love the design and the 'spooky' feeling of the set.  My rating is definitely a ten.  Great job LEGO! Re-release this one!

author: Legowarroir
title: I give this a 10!
review:
I got this for christmas and it is set is awsome! I finished the set in a day.
It is cool how mostly all of the time twisters and time crusiers sets move while you move them, and this set does alot of moving! In the front part  the fire moves up and down. On the second part, the wings on the side move up and down, and the swirling circle swirls. And on the last part the thing the ghost stands on goes up and down.

author: hustla187
title: Crazy Train
review: Time Cruisers was an odd and bizarre theme, but it made up for that with the Twisted Time Train. This set has alot of great pieces from the Fright Knight shields, to the ghost minifigs. The train is also very cool and the detail of this set sure gives this set its name. 5 out of 5 for a fantastic set.

author: smiley905
title: very..random
review: im realy stumped on this set, i mean whats the theme?! but anyways, its still realy cool, and so many good peices too. i was at walmart one day and this set was just sitting there, the box was crumpled and there was no price, but i liked it so i went to see how much it was. im so glad i bought it, but it came apart when i moved, and i realy liked it. it has so many moving peices, and its realy good for spare parts if yuo took it apart. i cant rally rember it much, but the entire thing was great. i cant realy tell you much about it, but it has a lot of playability if you have a good imagination. if you see it, (which i highly doubt you will) get it!
